description: Matt will be speaking on how H2O and LIME were used to predict employee turnover, a powerful #PeopleAnalytics solution for organizations!

Matt speaks with Kirill Eremenko, founder of SuperDataScience, on how tidyquant came to be, how the Business Science blog is used to help data scientist learn, R vs Python, and more! The episode should air in early December.
Davis will be in attendance. See him for tidyquant stickers!!!
New tools for performing financial and time series analysis within the tidyverse
New tools for performing financial within the tidyverse
Matt presented on time series analysis including R packages tidyquant, timetk, sweep, and tibbletime. Video coming shortly!
Matt spoke with Mike Delgado about HR Analytics, R and more! Check out the Facebook LIVE video here!
Matt gave a talk on HR Analytics: Using Machine Learning to Predict Employee Turnover
